amendment.description: Amendment repeals the authorization for the National Drug Intelligence Center.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 40 printed in House Report 112-88 to repeal the establishment of the National Drug Intelligence Center.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A020) Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 172 (Roll no. 355).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A020) Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 172 (Roll no. 355).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Flake.
